trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器提供设计时支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"> </xref> Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control implements the functionality of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control with the visual appearance of a button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件实现的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>与按钮的可视外观的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: The LinkButtonDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.
trans-unit.target: LinkButtonDesigner 类提供设计时支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinkButtonDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinkButtonDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinkButtonDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件或一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>设计图面上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinkButtonDesigner>
